ID First Name Last Name Email Birthday Phone Login Password
{{ user.id }} {{ user.firstName }} {{ user.lastName }} {{ user.email }} {{ user.birthday }} {{ user.phone }} {{ user.login }} {{ user.password }}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {AppService} from "./app.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'project-front'; users!: User[];; constructor( private appService: AppService ) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.buscarDados(); } public async buscarDados(): Promise { return await new Promise((resolve, reject) => { this.appService.getDados().subscribe({ next: (resposta) => { console.log("resposta ---> "); console.log(resposta); this.users = resposta; console.log("this.users ---> "); console.log(this.users); resolve(); }, error: () => { reject(); }, }); }); } }
